PulseCheckTemplate.name: PulseCheckTemplate
PulseCheckTemplate.description: Represents a common template used to create Pulse Check records.

AssessmentQuestionId.description: The primary assessment question associated with the Pulse Check Template.

Category.description: Specifies the category of the Pulse Check.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency associated with the Pulse Check.

Description.description: The description of the Pulse Check Template.

ExpiryInDays.description: The number of days the Pulse Check is active.

IsRecurring.description: Indicates whether the Pulse Check is recurring (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

Name.description: The name of the Pulse Check Template.

Occurrences.description: The number of occurrences of the Pulse Check.

OmniProcessId.description: The Omnistudio Process associated with the Pulse Check Template.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

RecurrenceFrequency.description: Specifies the frequency that the Pulse Check occurs.
